statements: UPDATE compliance_data SET compliance_status='Non-Compliant', last_audit_date='2022-09-15' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE compliance_data SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE industry_standards SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE standard_id = 3;
UPDATE compliance_data SET regulation_type = 'GDPR', compliance_status = TRUE WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
UPDATE industry_standards SET published_date = '2022-01-01', description = 'Updated standards for cybersecurity.', standard_name = 'Cybersecurity Standards' WHERE standard_id = 3;
UPDATE ComplianceData SET compliance_status = false, last_audit_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE IndustryStandards SET description = 'Updated standard description' WHERE standard_id = 5
UPDATE ComplianceData SET compliance_status = TRUE, last_audit_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp' AND id = 1;
UPDATE IndustryStandards SET description = 'Updated standards for compliance' WHERE standard_name = 'ISO 9001';
UPDATE regulatory_agencies SET contact_email = 'info@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_records SET compliance_level = 'High' WHERE company_id = 5 AND standard_id = 3;
UPDATE companies SET industry = 'Technology', location = 'California' WHERE id = 1;
